name: The Weak Do Not Have the Right to Choose How They Die!!!
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Donquixote Pirates
effect: [Main]/[Counter] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Leader or Character cards. Then, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 6 or less.
trigger: [Trigger] Set up to 5 of your DON!! cards as active.
